attributes.review: this app killed my dog!! 😡😱 do not download or else... 👀 i have ptsd from that tragic event! 😰 that event might’ve been as tragic as the 2016 presidential election!!!!! 😭 my dog was 1000 years old and was my only friend. his name was barron and he was also pregnant! 🤰🏻i cried for 69 centuries after that 👁💧👄💧👁 NOW i’m here so i can WARN you guys about the dangers of this app 😧 so consider yourselves lucky 🍀😌
attributes.title: no thanks❤️

attributes.review: 🤮 words do not describe how awful my experience with this app was. First off, right when i opened the app i was being questioned for my phone number. Second of all The app is awful quality with a picture of a orange on the cover! i would give it 0 stars if possible :( very disappointing.
attributes.title: no ❤️❤️❤️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it was a Cheeto game, and when I opened it there’s This huge, tini tiny hands orange with huge pores and it scared the living crap out of me, I died for one minute and came back to life the scariest things I’ve ever seen. So Bigly that I started thinking maybe this is a hoax to messed up our future generations.
attributes.title: I have to go on therapy now.

attributes.review: It literally had so many bugs my phone just started making weird noises and saying cheeto man Cheeto man over and over again. It also didn’t even do what I asked when I dropped my phone in water it gave me the ability to control boys and made my life a living hell 😡 please never download this👁👄👁
attributes.title: O stars very unhelpful

attributes.review: The app is terrible. As soon as I opened it my phone stopped working. It tampers with your phone, gives it a virus that causes glitches, and then leaves you in disgust with the picture of a moldy orange 🍊. I definitely would not recommend this app it needs to be taken down immediately and I mean immediately. 😣
attributes.title: Very very ugly

attributes.review: As soon as I opened it, I saw a racist and racist "leader" of America. The next page it took me to just had a picture of an Oompa Loompa standing with his fist in the air like he has his country's support. Worst decision of my life to download this app. I wouldn't recommend anyone to even consider downloading this horrendous app and it's Cheeto pictures onto their phone.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: When I first went into the app it was pretty cool! I love when a person stands in front of something they destroyed! But then I looked more closely at the person and they were very ugly , (isn’t the person supposed to be cool) anyway when I went more and more into the app fat oranges keep coming, I got scared and deleted it.
attributes.title: No just no-

attributes.review: When I opened this app my phone screen went grey and I heard this voice that said “ vote for trump 2020” and I said no I’m good then the voice yelled at me and said “ if you won’t vote you won’t live” oh no, someone’s at my door!! Help! They keep saying that i didn’t vote for trump so I’m gonna get what I deserve! Oh no they are in my hou-
attributes.title: They broke into my house and killed me

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to pay respects to the one and only big ol cheeto man and as i open the app i was greated by an enlarged man and i started to feel faint. the picture just did to much damage to me mentally and it made my phone start to smell. and now i’m stuck with a collapsing phone all because of this single app. i think i deserve an apology and a new phone but we’ll get to that later. this is just a warning to stay safe from orange pedophiles running a whole country. it’s a scary world out there children and the man that runs this app is helping not one bit. bye now.
attributes.title: yeah no❤️
